## TemplateRenderProps interface

The shape of the data passed directly to the template's render function. Extends the [TemplateProps](./pages.templateprops.md) interface and has the additions of a path and a relativePrefixToRoot field.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface TemplateRenderProps<T = any> extends TemplateProps<T>
```

**Extends:** [TemplateProps](./pages.templateprops.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

## Properties

| Property                                                                    | Modifiers | Type   | Description                                                                                                                                        |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [path](./pages.templaterenderprops.path.md)                                 |           | string | The path that the generated file will live at on the site, as defined by the [GetPath](./pages.getpath.md) function.                               |
| [relativePrefixToRoot](./pages.templaterenderprops.relativeprefixtoroot.md) |           | string | The relative path from the generated page to the root of the site. i.e. The path example/path/foo would have the relativePrefixToRoot of '../../'. |
